content: **garland autumn 2024 is the result of the collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** one size **measurements ** 168cm / 66 x 73 5cm / 29 **materials ** garland hobbii x pom pom 70% cotton 30% alpaca 105m / 114yd per 50 g shade heart of gold 14 balls **hook ** 2 5mm / us b or c crochet hook always use a hook size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 21 sts & 24 row = 10cm / 4 over single_crochet using 2 5mm hook after blocking **pattern information ** heart of gold is turned creating a defined right side rs and wrong side ws to create the textured surface cable crochet is used a modified front post stitch is used to create the wheat texture notes for each of these stitches can be found in the stitch notes **find the pattern in more languages
